record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR
record.narrative:
PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR -- (Senate - July 16, 2008)

[Page: S6877]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Jeffrey Phan, a fellow in my office, be permitted floor privileges today.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that two law clerks from my staff--Rob Abraham and Ysmael Fonseca--and Jordan LaClair, an intern in my office, be granted floor privileges for the remainder of this work period.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
